targets.rawSql:
select avg(sample) as " activation ", minute(timestamp) as "time" 
from light 
where  sample<20 and DAY(timestamp)=DAY(current_date())and month(timestamp)=month(current_date())and year(timestamp)=year(current_date())
group by minute(timestamp);

select avg(sample) as " activation ", minute(timestamp) as "time" 
from temperature 
where  sample>26 and DAY(timestamp)=DAY(current_date())and month(timestamp)=month(current_date())and year(timestamp)=year(current_date())
group by minute(timestamp);

select sum((60-sample)*0.3) as Litri
from humidity as prima 
where 
sample<40 
and
MONTH(timestamp)=MONTH(current_date())
and 
YEAR(timestamp)=YEAR(current_date())
and
DATE_ADD(timestamp, interval 10 SECOND) IN ( select timestamp
                                             from humidity
                                             where machineid=prima.machineid 
                                             and 
                                             sample>=60 
                                             )

SELECT
  timestamp AS "time",
  sample
FROM temperature
WHERE
  machineid = 1
ORDER BY timestamp

  timestamp AS "time",
